tilesData.name: Data Visualization App
tilesData.text: Web app for data visualization of solar energy production and electricity consumption in residential buildings. Scheduled aggregation and processing of data from three third-party APIs. Full responsibility for the technical implementation of theproject.
tilesData.stack: JavaScript, D3, JQuery, Python, Django, PostgreSQL, Docker

tilesData.name: Contact and Portfolio Page
tilesData.text: Personal landing page to demonstrate projects. Developed with React.

tilesData.name: JavaScript Games Platform
tilesData.text: App developed for a master-level course Web Software Development at Aalto University. Functionality including: two categories of users: players and developers, purchases through a third-party payment system, playing third-party games and storing scores and game states

tilesData.name: Questionnaire App
tilesData.text: App for Stupid Hackathon. A never-ending questionnaire.

infoData.name: Ekaterina (Kate) Dorrer
infoData.title: Web Developer
infoData.description: Junior web developer with business background. Currently open for new projects, job and internship opportunities.
